name: RudeBird
description:
Annoy as many humans as possible by doing what birds do best.

In this game, you are the most annoying bird in the world. You spend your days amusing yourself by dive-bombing humans. It's really a lot of fun! See what happens if you hit them in the face. 

Add to the fun by collecting power ups! Old burritos give you a fart boost. Candy bars give you a sugar rush. Eating worms gives you more .... em ... ammo. And, discarded laxatives makes your ammo go further.
